entities.name: secret keeper
entities.description: The person who keeps the Potters' location secret from You-Know-Who. (Excerpt: "As long as the Secret-Keeper refused to speak..." and "James Potter told Dumbledore that Black would die rather than tell where they were")

entities.name: lily potter
entities.description: The wife of James Potter. (Excerpt: "Lily and James were staying for years..." )

entities.name: james potter
entities.description: The husband of Lily Potter. (Excerpt: "Lily and James were staying for years..." )

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story. (Excerpt: "You-Know-Who could search the village..." )

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is a friend to James Potter. (Excerpt: "Dumbledore remained worried..." and "James Potter told Dumbledore that Black would die rather than tell where they were")

entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: A person who is present in the conversation. (Excerpt: "So Black was the Potters' Secret-Keeper?" )

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is a friend to James Potter. (Excerpt: "Professor McGonagall said..." )

entities.name: black
entities.description: The Secret-Keeper of the Potters. (Excerpt: "James Potter told Dumbledore that Black would die rather than tell where they were")

relationships.description: Dumbledore suspected that Black was a traitor who was passing information to You-Know-Who. (Excerpt: "He was sure that somebody close to the Potters had been keeping You-Know-Who informed of their movements..." )
Black was suspected by Dumbledore to be a traitor. (Excerpt: "He had suspected for some time that someone on our side had turned traitor and was passing a lot of information to You-Know-Who.")
James Potter used Black as the Secret-Keeper. (Excerpt: "But James Potter insisted on using Black?" )
